name: Escape from the Jungle
description:
Escape from the Jungle

Sci-fi story about a slave escapee trying to reach his freedom. And for that he needs to overcome small obstacles and challenges, meet unexpected friends and enemies.

Small and short action adventure game, developed mostly as a Unity learning exercise and for prototyping some game mechanics.

Key features
  • WSAD and mouse controls.
  • Inventory - pickup items and use them
  • Crafting - combining items
  • Dialogues with NPC
  • Simple 2D physics
  • Animation trees
